text: Our Company does not contemplate any issuance or placement of Equity Shares from the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus till the listing of the Equity Shares.
ISSUE OF EQUITY SHARES FOR CONSIDERATION OTHER THAN CASH IN THE LAST ONE YEAR
Our Company has not issued any equity shares for consideration other than cash in the one year preceding the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus except as mentioned below:

EXEMPTION FROM COMPLYING WITH ANY PROVISIONS OF SECURITIES LAW:
As on the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus, our Company has not sought any exemption from provisions of securities law enacted by SEBI.
